text: @brithume @brithume has to be a very specialized, extra-strength kind of Moron to suggest that Andrew Cuomo has any kind of culpability in the Covid-19 Pandemic. Unlike the cowardly and irresponsible Orange Imbecile, Cuomo actually, ya know, does stuff. Trump Owns Every Death. https://t.co/YvRvU0GTEZ
